overview: "BUZZ!!" THE MOVIE is a home video by B'z, released on January 1, 1996. The film shows the majority of the setlist to B'z LIVE-GYM Pleasure'95 "BUZZ!!" in full, along with a great deal of backstage footage and interviews from various shows. The video was later issued on DVD on March 14, 2001, with two bonus tracks "Mou Ichido Kiss Shitakatta" and "Hadashi no Megami", along with three other older home video releases and the band's then-latest single, "ultra soul".
title: "BUZZ!!" THE MOVIE
